name: Home in the Deep
description:
Prototype for a game centered about building a settlement in a cave. 

Current WIP is the building system itself as well as the look of the game.

Its currently possible to build more or less everything with 3 materials: Stone wood and brick. Blocks can be resized and placed at arbitrary angles. You can also load/save your creations.

Any Feedback as well as Pictures of what you build would be massively appreciated.

Follow me on twitter if you are interested in Updates for this Project:
https://twitter.com/KuMa30848720
